column2: SELECT TOP #   SPhot.specObjID,   SPhot.mjd,   SPhot.plate,   SPhot.fiberID,      SPhot.z,   SPhot.zErr,      SPhot.ra,   SPhot.dec,      SPhot.objID, --  SPhot.objtype, --  SPhot.type,      SObj.snMedian_u,  -- Median S/N in g-band   SObj.snMedian_g,  -- Median S/N in r-band   SObj.snMedian_r,  -- Median S/N in r-band   SObj.snMedian_i,  -- Median S/N in i-band   SObj.snMedian_z,  -- Median S/N in z-band        gSL.h_alpha_eqw,   gSL.h_alpha_eqw_err    --LN1.name,   --L1.ew,      -- equivalent width   --L1.ewErr    -- error in equivalent width       FROM dr1#.SpecPhoto AS SPhot   JOIN dr1#.SpecObj AS SObj ON SObj.specObjID = SPhot.specObjID   JOIN dr1#.galSpecLine AS gSL ON gSL.specObjID = SPhot.specObjID   --dr1#.galSpecLine AS gSL,   --dr1#.SpecLineNames AS LN1   --dr7.SpecObj as SObj    WHERE SPhot.zWarning = #   --and SPhot.SpecObjID = L1.SpecObjID  -- L1 is a line of SPhot.   --and LN1.name = &&&   --and L1.LineID = LN1.value  -- The wavelength of the line (for H_alpha, # Angstroms)   --and L1.ew > #
